sentences.en: Athletics South Africa was formed by an amalgamation of two organisations.
sentences.cn: 南非体育协会由两个组织合并而成。

sentences.en: Can you tell us something about your experiences in Africa?
sentences.cn: 你能告诉我们一些有关你在非洲的经历吗？

sentences.en: Developments in South Africa receive extensive coverage in The Sunday Telegraph.
sentences.cn: 《星期日电讯报》全面报道了南非的发展。

sentences.en: England were comprehensively beaten by South Africa.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队被南非队彻底打败。

sentences.en: From Nairobi here's our East Africa correspondent, Colin Blane.
sentences.cn: 以下是来自内罗毕东非记者科林·布兰的报道。

sentences.en: He had been on safari in East Africa with his son.
sentences.cn: 他曾和他儿子到东非游猎。

sentences.en: He has returned to South Africa from his long overseas trip.
sentences.cn: 他结束了漫长的海外旅行回到南非。

sentences.en: He toured South Africa organizing revival meetings.
sentences.cn: 他游历南非，组织奋兴布道会。

sentences.en: He traversed alone the whole continent of Africa from east to west.
sentences.cn: 他只身长途跋涉， 从东向西横穿整个非洲大陆。

sentences.en: He was one of the few thousand committed Rastafarians in South Africa.
sentences.cn: 他是南非仅有的几千名虔诚的拉斯塔法里教徒中的一员。

sentences.en: He was taken prisoner in North Africa in 1942.
sentences.cn: 他于1942年在北非被俘。

sentences.en: I want us to be judged by the impact we have on the health of the people of Africa , and the health of women.
sentences.cn: 特别是两组特别人群组。我希望以我们对非洲人民的健康，对妇女健康产生的影响来评价我们的工作。

sentences.en: In South Africa, Jani was a big fish in a small pond.
sentences.cn: 在南非，贾尼可谓塘中无鱼虾为大。

sentences.en: Mark has been working in West Africa for about six months.
sentences.cn: 马克已在西非工作了约6个月。

sentences.en: Others flee up through Africa towards the Mediterranean Coast and then across the Mediterranean.
sentences.cn: 有些人经由非洲北边逃离到地中海沿岸，再越过地中海。

sentences.en: South Africa was going through a period of irreversible change.
sentences.cn: 南非正在经历一场不可逆转的变革。

sentences.en: The giraffe ranges in Africa.
sentences.cn: 长颈鹿生长在非洲。

sentences.en: The practice still prevails in some parts of Africa.
sentences.cn: 这种做法在非洲某些地区仍然很盛行。

sentences.en: The vast forests of West Africa have shrunk.
sentences.cn: 西非的大片森林面积已缩小了。

sentences.en: This is Elizabeth Blunt, BBC, West Africa.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司的伊丽莎白·布伦特在西非为您报道。

sentences.en: West Africa was the pivot of the cocoa trade.
sentences.cn: 西非是可可豆贸易的中心。

trans.tran_en: the second largest continent; located south of Europe and bordered to the west by the South Atlantic and to the east by the Indian Ocean
